The Economics Of Time

February 2010

Time is the most valuable non-renewable, infinite resource our world has.

Attention is when a portion of time is taken by an individual.

Attention transforms time into energy. If you spend it admiring Tom Cruise you will become less and he will become more.

Reality is built by the energies created by individuals spending attention.

This essay is about the world. With focus on values, time, resource, attention, energy, simulacra.
Success
The Mecanism Of Existence
